statements: SELECT * FROM DiversityData WHERE department = 'HR';
SELECT name, age, gender FROM DiversityData WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT employee_id, name, department FROM DiversityData WHERE age > 30;
SELECT * FROM DiversityData WHERE ethnicity = 'Asian' ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT name, gender, ethnicity FROM DiversityData WHERE department = 'IT' AND age BETWEEN 25 AND 35 ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT * FROM DiversityData WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY name DESC, department ASC
SELECT employee_id, name, age FROM DiversityData WHERE department = 'Engineering' AND gender = 'Male'
SELECT department, COUNT(*) AS count FROM DiversityData GROUP BY department
SELECT * FROM DiversityData WHERE ethnicity = 'Asian' ORDER BY employee_id ASC
SELECT name, gender, COUNT(*) AS count FROM DiversityData WHERE age <= 40 GROUP BY gender
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE age > 30;
SELECT first_name, last_name, department FROM employees WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT department, COUNT(employee_id) AS total_employees FROM employees GROUP BY department;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM employees WHERE department = 'Engineering' ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT department, AVG(age) AS average_age FROM employees GROUP BY department ORDER BY average_age DESC;
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY last_name DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, department FROM employees WHERE gender = 'Male' AND age BETWEEN 25 AND 40 ORDER BY department, last_name;
SELECT department, AVG(gender_diversity) AS avg_gender_diversity FROM diversity_stats GROUP BY department HAVING AVG(gender_diversity) > 0.5 ORDER BY avg_gender_diversity DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT department FROM employees WHERE ethnicity = 'Asian' ORDER BY department;
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE age < 30 AND (gender = 'Male' OR gender = 'Female') ORDER BY department, gender ASC, age DESC;
SELECT * FROM demographic_data;
SELECT name, age, department FROM demographic_data WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT id, gender, age FROM demographic_data WHERE department = 'HR';
SELECT * FROM diversity_stats ORDER BY year DESC;
SELECT employee_id, year, performance_rating FROM employee_ratings WHERE performance_rating > 4.5;
SELECT * FROM demographic_data ORDER BY age DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT name, gender FROM demographic_data WHERE department = 'HR';
SELECT id, name, age FROM demographic_data WHERE gender = 'Female' AND age > 30;
SELECT name, gender, department FROM demographic_data ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT * FROM diversity_stats WHERE year = 2022;
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE department='HR';
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM employees WHERE department='IT' ORDER BY last_name DESC;
SELECT employee_id, age FROM employees WHERE gender='M' AND department='Sales';
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE age > 30 AND age < 40;
SELECT department_name FROM departments WHERE department_id=1;
SELECT employee_id, first_name, last_name FROM employees;
SELECT department, COUNT(*) as total_employees FROM employees GROUP BY department;
SELECT * FROM departments WHERE department_id = 2;
SELECT employee_id, department, age FROM employees WHERE gender = 'F' AND age > 30;
SELECT metric_name, MAX(value) AS max_value FROM diversity_metrics GROUP BY metric_name;
SELECT * FROM employee_demographics;
SELECT id, name, age FROM employee_demographics WHERE age > 30;
SELECT department_name, total_employees FROM department_demographics ORDER BY total_employees DESC;
SELECT region_name, diversity_score FROM region_demographics WHERE diversity_score > 0.7;
SELECT metric_name, metric_value FROM diversity_metrics;
SELECT * FROM employee_demographics WHERE age > 30 AND gender = 'Male' ORDER BY age DESC
SELECT department_name, total_employees, female_employees, male_employees FROM department_demographics WHERE female_employees + male_employees > 50
SELECT * FROM region_demographics WHERE diversity_score < 0.5 ORDER BY diversity_score DESC
SELECT metric_name, metric_value FROM diversity_metrics ORDER BY metric_value DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT employee_id, performance_rating, diversity_rating FROM employee_ratings WHERE performance_rating > 4 ORDER BY employee_id DESC
